meanings.definition: A polygon with nine sides and nine angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew a nonagon in my math class today.
meanings.sent2: The stop sign has the shape of a nonagon.
meanings.sent3: The nonagon and the octagon had a race to see who was faster.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace was a nonagon of sparkling diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The nonagon looked like a crown fit for a queen.
